Messages.MinNumberChanged: Minimum number of players successfully changed to {number}.
Messages.DropFrequencyChanged: Frequency drop supplies successfully changed to {number}.
Messages.PlaneRemovedTrigger: Cargo Plane has removed. The event was triggered not by timer.
Messages.SupplyLanded: Supply has landed at coordinates X: {x} Y: {y} Z: {z}
Messages.LootReset: Custom loot successfully reset to the default settings.
Messages.DropFrequencyExplain: Specify the frequency drop supplies in minutes. Example: /airdrop_freq 60
Messages.SupplyRemoveExplain: Time in minutes after which the supply is removed. Example: /airdrop_stay 30
Messages.MinNumberExplain: Specify the minimum number of players. Example: /airdrop_min 3
Messages.PlaneRemovedMin: Cargo Plane has removed. Minimum number of players: {number}.
Messages.SupplyRemoveChanged: Time after which the supply is removed changed to {number}.
